scripts.package: zip -r output/$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.zip index.js package.json styles.css bin node_modules bower_components/froala-wysiwyg-editor/css/froala_style.css bower_components/angular-document/dist/angular-document.css
scripts.pub: aws lambda update-function-code --region us-east-1 --function-name arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:513485385076:function:vops-convert-pdf:2.0.4 --s3-bucket venueops-pdf-output s3://template-to-pdf-2.0.4.zip
